title: Double the Sin
description: Sinners 3.5~A Sinners erotic shortAfter a vicious attack by a creature of the night, Annie James loses not only her ability to walk in the sunlight but also the man of her dreams, Adio.Adio’s guilt over his failure to keep Annie safe has kept him at a distance, and although he has kept a close watch on her since her turning, he has made no attempt to reclaim the love they once shared…until now.
author: Charity Parkerson
